title: Best Moments | Paris 2024
description: A look back at all the best moments of Paris 2024. We relive the iconic sporting achievements and memories from the Games, including the Ceremonies, all sports, and the new and familiar stars of the Olympics.

title: Images of the Day - Day 16 | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: A look at the best moments of the Paris 2024 Games granting the chance to re-experience the greatest moments you might have missed.

title: FRA v USA - Women's Gold Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's Basketball Gold Medal Match took place on 11/08/2024 at Bercy Arena, Paris. The United States of America claimed Gold with a 67:66 win against France.

title: Women's Omnium Finals | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: This Women's Omnium Finals took place at the National Velodrome, France, on 11/08/2024. Jennifer Valente (USA) won the Gold with 144 points. Daria Pikulik (POL) came Silver and Ally Wollaston (NZL) completed the podium.

title: Men's Freestyle 97kg Finals | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Men's Freestyle 97kg Finals were held on 11/08/2024 at Champs-de-Mars Arena, Paris. Akhmed Tazhudinov (BRN) claimed the Gold with a 2:0 win against Givi Matcharashvili (GEO) while Magomedkhan Magomedov (AZE) beat Murazi McHedlidze (UKR) and Amirali Azarpira (IRI) beat Kyle Frederick Snyder (USA) for the Bronze Medals.

title: Men's Keirin Finals | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: This Men's Keirin Finals took place at the National Velodrome, France, on 11/08/2024. Harrie Lavreysen (NED) won the Gold, Matthew Richardson (AUS) claimed Silver and Matthew Glaetzer (AUS) won Bronze.

title: SRB v CRO - Men's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Men's Water Polo Gold Medal Match took place on 11/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris. Serbia claimed the Gold with a 13:11 victory against Croatia.

title: GER v DEN - Men's Gold Medal Match | Handball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Men's Handball Gold Medal Match took place on 11/08/2024 at Pierre Mauroy Stadium, Paris. Denmark claimed the Gold with a decisive 39:26 win against Germany.

title: Women's Freestyle 76kg Finals | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's 76kg Freestyle Finals took place at the Champ-de-Mars Arena, France, on 11/08/2024. Yuka Kagami (JPN) won the Gold, with a victory over Kennedy Alexis Blades (USA) 3:1. Tatiana Renteria Renteria (COL) won the Bronze, with a victory over Genesis Rosangela Reasco Valdez (ECU), 2:1.

title: Women's Sprint Finals | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's Sprint Finals took place at the National Velodrome, France, on 11/08/2024. Ellesse Andrews (NZL) won Gold, Lea Friedrich (GER) claimed Silver, and Emma Finucane (GBR) completed the podium.

title: Women's +81kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's +81kg Weightlifting competition took place on 11/08/2024 at South Paris Arena. Li Wenwen (CHN) claimed Gold with a total of 309. Park Hyejeong (KOR) took Silver and Emily Campbell (GBR) completed the podium.

title: Women's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 11/08/2024. Italy won the Gold with a final score ITA 3:0 USA.

title: Women's Finals | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's Modern Pentathlon Finals were held on 11/08/2024 at Chateau de Versailles. Michelle Gulyas (HUN) claimed the Gold with a new World Record total of 1461 points. Elodie Clouvel (FRA) toook Silver and Seong Seungmin (KOR) completed the podium.

title: BEL v AUS - Women's Bronze Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Women's Basketball Bronze Medal Game took place on 11/08/2024 at Bercy Arena, Paris. Australia claimed the Bronze with an 85:81 win against Belgium.

title: Men's Freestyle 65kg Finals | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: This Men's Freestyle 65kg Finals took place at the Champ-de-Mars Arena, France, on 11/08/2024. Kotaro Kiyooka (JPN) won the Gold over Rahman Amouzadkhalili (IRI) with a final score 10:3. Islam Dudaev (ALB) won the Bronze with a victory over Iszmail Muszukajev (HUN), 13:12.

title: ESP v SLO - Men's Bronze Medal Match | Handball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Men's Handball Bronze Medal Match was held on 11/08/2024 in Pierre Mauroy Stadium, Paris. Spain claimed the Bronze with a 23:22 win against Slovenia.

title: USA v HUN - Men's Bronze Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: The Men's Water polo Bronze Medal Match was held on 11/08/2024 at La Defense Arena, Paris. The United States of America claimed the Bronze with an 11:8 victory over Hungary.

title: Paris 2024 - The Recap | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: A comprehensive recap of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games, highlighting the most memorable moments, achievements, and events from the Games.

title: Triumphus Cosmos - Day 16 | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: Experience the final day of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games with Triumphus Cosmos, capturing the essence and excitement of the closing events.

title: Paris 2024 Closing Ceremony | Olympic Games Paris 2024
description: Relive the spectacular Paris 2024 Closing Ceremony, celebrating the end of the Games with stunning performances and emotional farewells.
